sentence: I guess there are no quiet rooms
Our original assigned room had a broken toilet and no view
Bottled water was not available the 2nd day
Snacks at the executive room are to be thrown away
They had to send someone to our room so I showed them a picture for what we were asking for
Rooms are nice bathrooms needs attention and restaurant needs more choices
Calls and face to face conversations with management have stalemated at they will put a portable twin in the room
The service is low to medium and too often they assign to wrong ocopued rooms
No follow up was done by management to check on our new rooms or apologize for the inconvenience
So no shower nada would have rated it higher but No Water at 530am kinda took that extra star away
Nice rooms with a fantastic view

I satayed in this hotel last week and thay are remodeling the whole place and had my thought about the noice and what a surprice the new room in the 5th flor that are alredy remodel are wonderful they now have a bath tub and the room is huge like a suite the decorator did a great job here lots of new details in the room starting with a 50 TV new carpets and No noice at all this aded to the charming people that work in that hotel and i am glad for them since i have being their client for the past 12 years
Has WiFi in every area complementary Parking and a very secured electronic access to all Floors and Rooms
The rooms are phenomenal with beautiful modern design
I have enjoyed the stay my past 2 times at the embajador mainly because I love the newly renovated rooms
Great stay very quiet great location close to turistic spots but not in the commotion of things very nice rooms
it is now a modern one with very good rooms but still with a great service and atmosphere
Wonderful people rooms and breakfast for business travellers in Santo Domingo
I had an early check in flowers chocolate a ready to go bathtub fully decorated with rose petals

amazing property bilingual staff and very attentive to guests needs the rooms are very clean also the outside garden and the 5th and 8th floors are good for smokers and do not let me forget the view of Santo Domingo and the ocean from the 8th floor is amazing
